name: War Online: Pacific
description: War Online Pacific is the first in a series of fast action WWII combat simulations.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 750Ti class DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectX supported audio device Additional Notes: For VR support an NVidia GTX 970
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0Ghz Intel Core 2 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 960 class, or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectX supported audio device Additional Notes: For VR support an NVidia 1070, or better graphics card is recommended
